Package triple.com

Class Instructor

java.lang.Object
triple.com.Instructor
public class Instructor extends Object
The Instructor class represents an instructor within the system. It stores the instructor's details such as name, password, login status, account status, and associated programs. It also provides functionality for logging in, updating programs, and managing subscriptions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor to initialize an instructor's account with a name and password.

  • Constructor Details

    • Instructor

      public Instructor(String name, String password)
      Constructor to initialize an instructor's account with a name and password. The account is initially set to "pending" status, and the instructor is assigned the basic subscription plan.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the instructor
      password - the password for the instructor's account

  • Method Details

    • sendRequest

      public void sendRequest()
      Sends a request to the admin for account approval. This is called when an instructor account is created and needs admin validation.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the instructor.
      Returns:
      the name of the instructor

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the instructor.
      Parameters:
      name - the new name of the instructor

    • isLoggedIn

      public boolean isLoggedIn()
      Returns the login status of the instructor.
      Returns:
      true if the instructor is logged in, false otherwise

    • setLoggedIn

      public void setLoggedIn(boolean loggedIn)
      Sets the login status of the instructor.
      Parameters:
      loggedIn - true if the instructor is logged in, false otherwise

    • getId

      public String getId()
      Returns the unique instructor ID.
      Returns:
      the instructor ID

    • login

      public Instructor login(String name, String password)
      Attempts to log in an instructor with the provided name and password. If the credentials match, the instructor is logged in.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the instructor
      password - the password for the instructor's account
      Returns:
      the logged-in instructor if credentials are valid, otherwise null

    • updateProgramTitle

      public Program updateProgramTitle(String title, String programId)
      Updates the title of an existing program.
      Parameters:
      title - the new title for the program
      programId - the ID of the program to be updated
      Returns:
      the updated program

    • updateProgramFees

      public Program updateProgramFees(int fees, String programId)
      Updates the fees of an existing program.
      Parameters:
      fees - the new fees for the program
      programId - the ID of the program to be updated
      Returns:
      the updated program

    • deleteMyProgram

      public void deleteMyProgram(String programId)
      Deletes a program associated with the instructor.
      Parameters:
      programId - the ID of the program to be deleted

    • createProgram

      public Program createProgram(int fees, String title, int duration, String difficulty)
      Creates a new program with the specified details (fees, title, duration, and difficulty). The instructor must be logged in to create the program.
      Parameters:
      fees - the fees for the program
      title - the title of the program
      duration - the duration of the program in days
      difficulty - the difficulty level of the program
      Returns:
      the created program if the instructor is logged in, null otherwise

    • addGoalToProgram

      public void addGoalToProgram(String programId, String type, double startValue, double targetValue)
      Adds a goal to an existing program. The goal is represented by a Progress object, which contains the type of goal (e.g., weight loss, skill improvement), the starting value, and the target value.
      Parameters:
      programId - the ID of the program to which the goal will be added
      type - the type of the goal (e.g., weight loss, skill improvement)
      startValue - the starting value of the goal
      targetValue - the target value of the goal

    • viewPrograms

      public void viewPrograms()
      Displays a list of all programs created by the instructor. The instructor must be logged in to view the programs.

    • getStatus

      public String getStatus()
      Returns the current status of the instructor's account ("pending", "valid", "invalid").
      Returns:
      the current status of the instructor

    • getPlan

      public PlanInstructor getPlan()
      Returns the subscription plan of the instructor.
      Returns:
      the plan currently assigned to the instructor

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(String status)
      Sets the status of the instructor's account. If the status is set to "valid" or "invalid", the request to become an instructor is removed from the pending state.
      Parameters:
      status - the new status to be set (either "valid" or "invalid")

    • updateName

      public void updateName(String newName)
      Updates the name of the instructor.
      Parameters:
      newName - the new name to set for the instructor

    • updatePassword

      public void updatePassword(String newPassword)
      Updates the password of the instructor.
      Parameters:
      newPassword - the new password to set for the instructor

    • getPassword

      public String getPassword()
      Returns the current password of the instructor.
      Returns:
      the current password of the instructor

    • changeSubscription

      public void changeSubscription(PlanInstructor plan)
      Changes the subscription plan of the instructor. The current plan is cancelled, and the new plan is subscribed to.
      Parameters:
      plan - the new subscription plan to assign to the instructor

    • deleteSubscription

      public void deleteSubscription()
      Cancels the current subscription plan and assigns the basic plan to the instructor.

    • viewMessages

      public void viewMessages()
      Views all the messages in the instructor's inbox. If there are no messages, a message indicating so is shown.

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage(Message message)
      Receives a message and adds it to the instructor's inbox.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be received

    • sendMessage

      public Message sendMessage(Client recipient, String title, String content)
      Sends a message to a client. The message includes a title, content, and the instructor's ID. The message is added to the recipient's inbox.
      Parameters:
      recipient - the client to whom the message is being sent
      title - the title of the message
      content - the content of the message
      Returns:
      the sent message

    • deleteMessage

      public void deleteMessage(Message message)
      Deletes a specific message from the instructor's inbox.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be deleted

    • getInbox

      public ArrayList<Message> getInbox()
      Returns the inbox of the instructor containing all received messages.
      Returns:
      the list of messages in the instructor's inbox
